trs: The reindeer names: well, "bəjun" well these names, 'wild reindeer' there's also, "siru" 'male reindeer', "gəlun" 'untrained reindeer', "sačari" 'old female reindeer', "nʼami" 'female reindeer', "əŋnəkon" 'reindeer calf', "waŋgaj" 'infertile female reindeer', "gilgə" 'reindeer ox', "sujukan" 'reindeer bull up to one year', "nʼamukan" 'heifer up to one year', "awlakan" 'heifer older than one year'.
